mapper.select: SELECT CHECKNO, ACNO, RESNO, CHECKDATE, TITLE, ROADADDR, GUNO, GUNAME, DONGNO, DONGNAME , MWOLSE, DEPOSIT, MJEONSE, MMAEMAE, PET_SCORENO, PET_CO, SECURITY_SCORENO, SECURITY_CO , TRANSPORT_SCORENO, TRANSPORT_CO, HONJAP_SCORENO, HONJAP_CO , MART, LAUNDRY, HOSPITAL, FOOD, CULTURE, PARK, CONV_CO, GOOD, BAD, ETC, SECRET_CO FROM VIEW_READCHECK WHERE CHECKNO=#{checkNo}
SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT C.CH_TAG_NO AS CHTAGNO, C.CH_B_NO AS CHBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM CHECKTAG C, STICKER S WHERE C.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY CHTAGNO ) WHERE CHBNO=#{chbNo}

SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT M.MC_TAG_NO AS MCTAGNO, M.CHECK_NO AS CHECKNO, CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM MYCHECKTAG M, STICKER S WHERE M.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY MCTAGNO ) WHERE CHECKNO=#{checkNo}

SELECT GUNAME, DONGNAME, NVL(ROUND(WOLSEAVG), -1) AS MWOLSE, NVL(ROUND(WOLSEDEPOSITAVG), -1) AS DEPOSIT , NVL(ROUND(JEONSEAVG), -1) AS MJEONSE, NVL(ROUND(MAEMAEAVG), -1) AS MMAEMAE, NVL(ROUND(SECURITYAVG, 1), -1) AS SECURITY_SCORE , NVL(ROUND(TRANSPORTAVG, 1), -1) AS TRANSPORT_SCORE, NVL(ROUND(HONJAPAVG, 1), -1) AS HONJAP_SCORE , NVL(ROUND(CONVENIENCEAVG, 1), -1) AS CONVENIENCE_SCORE, NVL(ROUND(PETAVG, 1), -1) AS PET_SCORE FROM VIEW_REGION WHERE DONGNO=#{dongNo}
SELECT CONTENT FROM ( SELECT L.LO_TAG_NO AS LOTAGNO, L.LO_B_NO AS LOBNO, S.CONTENT AS CONTENT FROM LOCALTAG L, STICKER S WHERE L.CSTICKER_NO=S.CSTICKER_NO(+) ORDER BY LOTAGNO ) WHERE LOBNO=#{lobNo}
